assumptions.pricing_notes: ranges are used; final price is computed from world modifiers

branches.name: Automation
branches.description: Reduce admin time and errors while boosting throughput.

branches.name: Growth
branches.description: Grow leads and improve conversion over time.

branches.name: Product
branches.description: Improve retention, reduce churn, and lower support load.
branches.risk_notes: Polish without PMF yields limited impact.

branches.name: Efficiency
branches.description: Reduce waste and improve output per asset.

branches.name: Safety
branches.description: Lower incidents, fines, and insurance costs.

branches.name: Throughput
branches.description: Scale with additional capacity and assets.

branches.name: Compliance
branches.description: Improve audit readiness and unlock larger clients.
branches.risk_notes: Audit failure risks reputation and extra costs.

branches.name: Cost Control
branches.description: Reduce leakage and improve process efficiency.

branches.name: Reliability
branches.description: Improve uptime, service levels, and reputation.

branches.name: Experience
branches.description: Increase ticket size and repeat rate.
branches.risk_notes: Experience needs marketing to translate into demand.

branches.name: Local Marketing
branches.description: Lift foot traffic and local demand.
